titleStmt.title: The first set of madrigals and mottets of 5. parts apt for viols and voyces. Newly composed by Orlando Gibbons, Batcheler of Musicke, and organist of his Maiesties honourable chappell in ordinarie.
Madrigals and mottets
titleStmt.author: Gibbons, Orlando, 1583-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Snodham, the assigne of W. Barley,

notesStmt.note: Five partbooks. At head of title, part 1: "Cantus."; part 2: "Altus."; part 3: "Tenor."; part 4: "Bassus."; part 5: "Quintus.".
Signatures: A-C⁴; A-C⁴; A-C⁴; A-C⁴; A-C⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
